name: Bravo Sample: Multiple API Requests
description:
Made for Bravo Studio. 

Connect multiple API requests to one app screen in your Bravo app with this sample Figma file setup.


To see the final result, go to the Sample Apps section in Bravo Studio and duplicate the same app connected to multiple requests.


Learn more about connecting multiple requests in the Bravo Studio help center.


Check out Bravo Studio üëè
